How to installed this programm?
I can`t do.
For what it is necessary ascrypt.dll?

Open C:\Documents and Settings\Username\Local Settings\Temp 
Run the installer, select language.
Two new folders have been created. Open 2nd new folder,  switch ascrypt.dll in the subfolder (overwrite).
*Continue Install*
next scenery by fsdreamteam: Chicago OÂ´Hare http://www.fsdreamteam.com/forum/index.php?topic=206.0 would be "scheisse", if there is no chance to crack thism, too.

I GOT IT TO WORK PEOPLE, 
my english is not super sorry for that.

1) first, use google and find out how to set up your pc to show the hidden files(maps)

2) go to, C:\Documents and Settings\Username\Local Settings\Temp 

3) Wacth it cloosly and then start the installation of VeniceX_V100, you will see a change in C:\Documents and Settings\Username\Local Settings\Temp, 2 maps will be extra added.

4) 1 map is with stuff from the scenery, you will not find ascrypt in that one, search for another one, there you will find ascrypt and then overwrite it with the crack.

5) continue the installation, it will give a error for fsx not found, just click continue, you will then see the screen to put the code & registration, just click again continue and it wil start the installation :) 

works perfect with mij vista, playing it right now and it?s a fun airport Venice. 

Sorry for the language, Englisch is hard for Croatian people hehe. Have fun .
Hi all, how do I install the crack in Windows Vista?  Help!  Many many thanks.

Have you try to right click and "Run as administrator" that works on Flight 1 software.
Try that, i will try that to. Or try in compatiblity mod on Windows XP.
I cannot find "C:\Documents and Settings\Username\Local Settings\Temp " on Vista.  Where else might the files be?
please seed..... Thanks!

NGC here is the address just replace X for your drive letter and your user name for *user*.


X:\Users\*USER*\AppData\Local\Temp

Also Go into your folder options and make sure you have can view hidden folders and files because the appdata is hidden.
